about_the_game:
Loop Frogs is a pixelated 2D puzzle platformer with a temporal component. Take control of two lovable frogs and master the time loop to save the day. Set a repeating loop of actions with one frog while the other discovers the route to advance.

  • Journey through 5 floors of hazards and fiendish puzzles.
  • Collect hidden objects.
  • Challenge yourself and beat each level's target time.
  • Full controller support.
